mapper.select: SELECT TS.id, TS.content, TS.`from`, TS.hot, GROUP_CONCAT(TT.id SEPARATOR ',') AS tagId, GROUP_CONCAT(TT.name SEPARATOR ',') AS tags FROM t_sentences TS LEFT JOIN t_sentence_tag TST ON TS.id = TST.sentence_id LEFT JOIN t_tags TT ON TST.tag_id = TT.id GROUP BY TS.id, TS.content, TS.`from`, TS.hot ORDER BY RAND() -- 随机排序 LIMIT 1; -- 只取一条数据
